value:
I look up to my sister. She's an
exceptional knight and a charming
woman. You could say she's perfect.

Prince Innes has had high hopes for
me since I joined the pegasus knights.
I must be worthy of his confidence!

You are rather mysterious,
Summoner... I somehow feel
more relaxed around you.

I've been told I need to "loosen up"
more. I didn't realize I was being
uptight in the first place...

This is a protective charm, a battle
amulet of the war god Fale. Syrene
delivered it to me.$k$pShe said it was a gift from our father.

I am Vanessa of Frelia's pegasus
knights. I come before you bearing
a delivery from your sworn ally.$k$pPlease accept this symbol of your
kinship with $Nf.

I will protect the prince, even
at the cost of my life!

I am still learning, but I must grow
ever stronger!

I'll never be able to defend anything
if I keep up like this...

I can feel strength surging anew.
I will see to it that the skies of
Askr remain safe.

I am Vanessa of Frelia's pegasus
knights, newly appointed to this post.
I shall defend you from the sky.

My mission is to ensure Prince Innes
remains safe. I would gladly lose my
life if it meant protecting him.$k$pBut he once told me that, as a
prince, he has a duty to protect me,
his subject, not the other way around.$k$pSo I intend to soar through every
battlefield with all my strength, that
I may aid in his noble designs.$k$pIf he wishes to save Askr, then I will
tirelessly defend the skies of this land
to make that wish a reality.$k$pIt feels like my partner, Titania,
agrees with me!
I will perform my duty!
No matter the obstacles...
Leave it to me!
I'll do my best...
Please... Forgive me...
I'm Vanessa. I'm captain of Frelia's pegasus knights.
Eeyah! Huh? I just had a leaf on me? Oh, thank you.
You know, I'm often told that I need to loosen up and not be so serious. What do you think?
I'd always tried to be like my sister. She's very strong, as both a knight and a person.
My pegasus and I can scout the enemy in no time.
My prince, I have...always...
When I'm with you, I can relax and just be myself.
I'm ready.
I'll consider it.
I will set out!
